Game

Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Game.Battle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Battle
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Starts a thread of battle panel between 2 character objects with a KeyListener for the actions performed by the "human" character object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
